name: Pension Runner
description:
Nobody has time to earn an honest wage now days. If you wanna get a sweet ride you have to find alternative ways to get paid. This is where collecting that pension money comes in. Run down grannies and collect their pension.

Controls:

Arrow Keys to move, accelerate and brake.

The faster you go the more money grannies drop.

Avoid obstacles and stay on the road.

Credits:
